name: gemini-external-catalog
description: Standardized registry for Gemini CLI capabilities, agents, and MCP servers.

agents.name: browser-assistant
agents.description: A specialized agent for web scraping, testing, and automation using the Standalone Browser MCP.

agents.name: catalog-manager
agents.description: A JIT agent to handle finding and installing items from the external catalog safely.

mcp-servers.name: engram
mcp-servers.description: Graph database for preserving persistent context.

mcp-servers.name: hmem
mcp-servers.description: Hierarchical memory server for context management.

mcp-servers.name: puppeteer
mcp-servers.description: Standalone Browser MCP for web interactions.
